dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:41,000,000. Relief shown pictorially. Includes "Avertissement." Prime meridian: Ferro. In French with added title in Latin: Asia accurate in imperia, regna, status & populos divisa, ad usum Ludovici XV, Galliarum Regis. Issued in: Atlas nouveau ... / par Guillaume de L'Isle ... A Amsterdam : chez Jean Cóvens et Corneille Mortier, 1730. 47 x 61 cm
